articles.author: Isaac Callan
articles.title: Meteor lit up sky over Niagara Falls, CN Tower early Saturday morning | Globalnews.ca - Global News
articles.description: The European Space Agency shared video of the meteor, named #C8FF042 and around one metre in diameter, passing across the CN Tower.
articles.content:
A meteor briefly lit up the sky behind Toronto’s CN Tower and above Niagara Falls overnight.
The European Space Agency shared video of the meteor in the early hours of Saturday morning, named #C8FF0… [+722 chars]

articles.title: Airbus Offers South Korea A ‘Win-Win’ Strategy To Export Its FA-50 Fighting Eagles To Western Europe - EurAsian Times
articles.description: Airbus has offered South Korea a "win-win strategy" to boost the sales of South Korea's FA-50 and other fighters to Western Europe.
articles.content: Airbus Defense and Space, headquartered in Germany, has offered Seoul a “win-win strategy” to boost the sales of South Korea’s FA-50 Fighting Eagles and other fighters to Western European countries.… [+5162 chars]
